optic_ratings.justification: The report does not provide any evidence of DAF / GIP or 'one pager' prepared, nor indications of all internal approvals obtained. The start date of the IT effort is known as March 27, 2025, but there are no specifics on approvals or their expected timeline. History of schedule changes and issues imply that approvals might not be forthcoming soon.
optic_ratings.recommendation: To move towards a Green rating, ensure that DAF / GIP or 'one pager' is prepared and obtain all necessary internal approvals from impacted portfolios. Establish a clear and committed timeline for obtaining these approvals to prevent further delays.

tasks_output.description:
Analyze the Project Status Report for project 'DMND0030713_T1PRJ0006688_Qlik Replicate ASM Credential Handling_TSI (PRJ5030372)' and evaluate its risk for the optic **firmness_of_opportunity**. **CRITERIA FOR firmness_of_opportunity:** - GREEN: DAF / GIP or 'one pager' prepared and all internal approvals obtained from all impacted portfolios. Start date of IT effort known - AMBER: DAF / GIP or 'one pager' in progress. Impacted portfolio approvals expected within 2 months. Tentative start date of IT effort known - RED: DAF / GIP or 'one pager' not yet prepared. Approvals not expected for >3 months. Start date of IT effort unknown **PROJECT STATUS REPORT TEXT:** Executive Summary:

Sept 2 - MDuke - No issues, Shell team had need for short term support, information was provided.

Highlights - DBA team was able to provide weekend contacts to provide assistance if needed.

Lowlights- short notice given on needed support cause support planning issues. 

Planned end date: 2025-10-13 17:00:00 Planned start date: 2025-03-27 00:00:00 Comments:

Sept 2 - MDuke - no additional comments.

Comments on Cost:

Sept 2 - MDuke - No issues.

Comments on Resources:

Sept 2 - MDuke - some concern on weekend coverage for migrations.

Comments on Schedule:

sept 2 - MDuke - no issues.

Comments on Scope:

Sept 2 - MDuke - no issues

Key Activities planned:

Sept 2 - MDuke - only as needed support.

Last Month's Achievements:

Sept 2 - Project deliverables were closed, Shell team requested additional support till the end of Sept to cover any issues.

Phase: Executing Executive Summary:

Aug 22 - MDuke - Project to be extended to Sept 30th, the extra time is to support the Shell team. this should correct the current RED status of the project and return it to green. 

Highlights: CR submitted, no issues.

Lowlight: T-Sys Pm late in submitting CR, partially due to misalignment on CR approval.

 

Aug 15 - MDuke - All project related task have been implemented, Customer requested more time to review before giving an approval to close.

Highlights - All remaining work clearly defined and assigned.

Lowlights - Project in red stauts, customer wanted more time to review the deliverables before giving project closure approval. 

Aug 5 - MDuke - CR requested to exten project end date and budget increase to cover additional work. The return to green plan is to extend the and date and budget, allow us to close the project on the 15th.

Highlights - All remaining work clearly defined and assigned.

Lowlights - Project in red stauts, customer wanted more time to review the deliverables before giving project closure approval. 

Planned end date: 2025-07-31 22:00:00 Planned start date: 2025-03-27 00:00:00 Comments:

Aug 15 - MDuke -  All project related task have been implemented, Customer requested more time to review before giving an approval to close.

Au 5 - MDuke - The project is currently red dure to cost and schedule issues, these were raised due to operation concerns around the finding the changes made allows the Qlik application with the new account the ability to shut down the DB. change needed to be made to the HLD to describe this. And we wanted to make a document regarding the request process.  

Comments on Cost:

Aug 5 - MDuke - CR request sent to Shell, cost increase included.

Comments on Schedule:

Aug 15 - MDuke - Customer wanted more time to review the closure deliverables.

Aug 5 - MDuke - requested end date extension to Aug 15th for final deliverables.

Key Activities planned:

Aug 5 - M Duke - Complete request template, complete HLD, Handover to ops, Close the project.

Last Month's Achievements:

Aug 5 - MDuke - RA completed. process for request defined.

Phase: Executing Executive Summary:

31 Jul - MDuke - Project is past end date status moved to red, RTG plan is to extend the project end Date to Aug 15 to complete the remaining task and to increase the budget to cover remaining work as well. Shell needs time to review and approve the budget and end date extension, but agrees the work need to be completed. Shell has a hard deadline to complete this project by Aug 31. 

Highlights - RA approved, cost and end date provided to Shell for approval.

Lowlights - Project behind schedule and the status is now red.

23 Jul - MDuke - After review with the project team there is still more effort needed to complete some components of the project namely Formalize Risk Acceptance, the Request Management Process, High-level design, and Handover to operations. The return to green plan is to extend the projects end date and increase the budget to accommodate the remaining work. 

Highlights - Work completed, Risk analysis and TTS to DB OPS in progress.

Lowlights - Project budget exhausted. Additional time needed and budget needed to complete.

 

18 Jul - MDuke - RA review still in progress.

Highlights - Work completed, Risk analysis and TTS to DB OPS n progress.

Lowlights - Project budget exhausted. 

 

 

8 Jul - MDuke - Glen Anderson working to help Shell complete RA to ensure that Shell understands the impacts of activating this service. All other project work is completed. 

Planned end date: 2025-07-31 17:00:00 Planned start date: 2025-03-27 00:00:00 Comments:

8 - Jul - MDuke - no issues at this time.

Comments on Cost:

Jul 25 - Project budget needs to be increase as the efforts to complete operationalize this project have required more effort than expected. the RTG is to work with customer to explain the needed funds and obtain them.

8 - Jul - MDuke - Complete budget used 

Comments on Schedule:

Jul 25 - Project end date extension needed to complete the following: Formalize Risk Acceptance, the Request Management Process, High-level design, and Handover to operations, end date change to Aug 29th will allow for the point to be properly discuss and implemented.   

Jul 9 - Dependent on forecast of storage growth or near-term need for capacity increase.

Key Activities planned:

8 - Jul - MDuke - Closing project. 

Last Month's Achievements:

8 - Jul - MDuke - Project handed over from Niels. Discussions completed on RA requirements. 

Phase: Executing Executive Summary:

Jun 18 - M Duke - PM Change complete, through the project is on target i would like clarity on some of the consequences of the actions taken so far to the security and performance of the DBs. 

Highlights - Work completed

Lowlights - Need to Send risk acceptance to Shell, for close out

June 5 Project is on schedule to be closed out end of this month

Planned end date: 2025-07-03 17:00:00 Planned start date: 2025-03-27 00:00:00 Comments:

planning close out end of June

Comments on Cost:

Jun 18 - M Duke - On Target

Comments on Resources:

Jun 18 - M Duke - no issues.

Comments on Schedule:

Jun 18 - M Duke - Project progressing, need clarity from ops and IRM  for close out.

Comments on Scope:

Jun 18 - M Duke - No issues at this time.

Key Activities planned:

June 18

Close out end of June
